Notes

Side A is the song Frances the Mute. It was intended to be the first act in the story (and therefore the first song in the album) but was not there on the CD due to space reasons. "Frances the Mute"'s lyrics appears on the inside of the album's CD tray. Side B was recorded live at the Wiltern LG Theater (3790 Wilshire Blvd., Los Angeles, CA) on May 6, 2004 All songs published by Amputekhture (ASCAP), Hija de Lola (ASCAP) and EMI April Music Inc. Approximately 10000 copies pressed
